sentence.Network_en: The same applies to the Spanish - speaking countries in Latin - America.

sentence.Network_en: Which country in Spanish - speaking America has the highest percentage of Protestants?
sentence.Network_cn: 西班牙语系美洲哪一国家新教徒比例最高?
